objectives: Students will discuss shopping and consumer behavior using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Business/Corporate themed scenarios related to shopping and consumer behavior
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining shopping and consumer behavior content with Business/Corporate narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore shopping and consumer behavior through a Business/Corporate lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a corporate or business challenge involving shopping and consumer behavior

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to shopping and consumer behavior in a business context
Students engage in business themed role-play about shopping and consumer behavior using informal register
Students create original business themed content about shopping and consumer behavior in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe shopping and consumer behavior in a Business/Corporate scenario?
What strategy or negotiation might be involved in shopping and consumer behavior?
Can you create a Business/Corporate story about shopping and consumer behavior?
How does shopping and consumer behavior change when viewed through a Business/Corporate perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this business scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Business/Corporate situation involving shopping and consumer behavior
roles: Character A: Using informal register in business context
Character B: Responding in informal register within business theme

topic_genre_blend: shopping and consumer behavior with strategy
shopping and consumer behavior with negotiation
shopping and consumer behavior with stakeholder

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Business/Corporate theme: Professional scenarios, workplace situations

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Business/Corporate themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
